trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_TODO_00<tab>Search for Kumoji's pots of linseed oil to the east of Sakazuki.
TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_TODO_01<tab>Return Kumoji's pots of linseed oil to him.
TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_000<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Do you have a quick moment? There is something I would like to ask of you.

TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_001<tab>They brought me in from Kugane to inspect the cannons and make sure everything is in working order. Problem is, the boat I came on was rocking so hard that my pots of linseed oil tumbled from their box and slid right into the ocean!

TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_002<tab>As embarrassing as this is to admit, I cannot swim and fetch them myself. You, however, look to be a natural-born diver. Might you go and retrieve them in my stead?
TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_003<tab>If the current is anything to go by, they will have been swept to the west of here, meaning they are somewhere along the eastern coast of Sakazuki.
TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_004<tab>There is a good chance my pots of linseed oil are in the seas to the east of Sakazuki. Please, bring them back to me.
TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_009<tab>Please tell me you managed to find them?

TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_010<tab>Praise the kami! I am saved! Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. The salty winds here cause metals to corrode at a much faster rate. To protect our cannons, we must frequently slather this oil on them.

TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_011<tab>The Ruby Price is Hingashi's main line of defense. Had I been unable to fulfill my duty, and an enemy nation came to attack, we would have had to face them with rusted cannons! What a disaster that would have been!
TEXT_STMBDZ204_02676_KUMOZI_000_012<tab>My good <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((sir)) /var>, you have done our nation a great service today. Please accept this as a reward.
